latex: Let $p_0(x),p_1(x),p_2(x),\ldots$ be polynomials such that $p_0(x)=x$ and for all positive integers $n$, $\dfrac{d}{dx}p_n(x)=p_{n-1}(x)$.  Define the function $p(x):[0,\infty)\to\mathbb{R}$ by $p(x)=p_n(x)$ for all $x\in [n,n+1)$.  Given that $p(x)$ is continuous on $[0,\infty)$, compute \[\sum_{n=0}^\infty p_n(2009).\]
